snippet.title: Treasure Stack 4-Player Versus Party Gameplay
snippet.description:
In Treasure Stack Versus Party Mode the player controls a character who stacks groups of like colored treasure chests and matches keys of the same color to unlock them and score points. Matches done in quick succession award a combo which multiplies the score of each subsequent match. 

Each match counts toward sending opponents demon runes to make matching more difficult for them. Conversely, scoring matches will also destroy incoming garbage runes your opponents send your way.

There are a couple nice updates in this gameplay video. Namely the fact that KO'd players can continue playing as ghosts and possibly knockout active players.
